predicate.note: Frames file for 'revalue' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: one arg
example.text: South Korean President Roh Tae Woo, brushing aside suggestions that the won be revalued [*-1] again, said the currency's current level against the dollar is ``appropriate.''

example.name: all args
example.text: John revalued his relationship with Mary as only slightly better than contracting the Black Death.
example.arg: only slightly better than contracting the Black Death
